summary: Jobless, single and in her early thirties, Hee-soo is miserable. Desperate, she sets out to find her ex-boyfriend, Byoung-woon, who owes her $3,500. Rather inconveniently, it turns out that... See full summary »
cast: Do-yeon Jeon|Jung-woo Ha|Il-hwa Choi|Ju-bong Gi|Kim Hye-Ok|Han Hyo-joo|Woo-hyeok Jeong|Si-nae Jo|Hee-jung Kim|Joo-ryeong Kim|Jung-ki Kim|Seo-hie Ko|Ji-eun Oh|Hye-rim Park|Dong-won Seo|Jang So-Yeon|Eun-yong Yang|Kim Young-Min
title: Meotjin haru
